body.para: I have verizon as my DSL provider. I started a g mail account for junk mail and stuff. I wanted to use the gmail account now to save e mails in its archive. I added my verizon e mail info to get mail from other accounts. Now I get my emails in google but it must take them off verizons server because if I log into my web based verizon account I
